actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that mental health specialist services shall be covered under part B of medicare and shall be a required service under medicaid.

summary.text: Amends titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for mental health specialist services under the Medicaid program and under part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII. Increases to $1,000 the amount considered as incurred expenses for the treatment of outpatient mental disorders under Medicare.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that mental health specialist services shall be covered under part B of medicare and shall be a required service under medicaid.
